text.introParagraph:
Simple tools for your 
 daily calcuations

text.noFavoredTools: No Favored tools, refresh to insure
text.noHiddenTools: No hidden tools, refresh to insure
text.noUnfavoredTools: No unfavored tools, refresh to insure
text.youCannotMoveHidenTools: To move hidden tools, tap once on the tool to show it
text.youCannotMoveToolsInFavorite: You cannot move items on the favorite page. Move the tools on the home page, and your move will be reflected here.
text.toolHasbeenFavored: Tool has been added to Favorite
text.errorFavoriting: There was an error while favoriting. Please contact the developer for help
text.toolHasbeenUnFavored: Tool has been removed from Favorite
text.errorHiding: There was an error while hiding. Please contact the developer for help

text.changeLanguageAlertBody: You have to change the language in the phone settings. The app will automatically reflect the change here.
text.areYouSureYoutoDeleteData: Are you sure you want to delete all app data?
text.thisWillDeleteAllData: This will delete all your created tools, favorites and settings.
text.deleteCompeleted: Delete complated! Refresh to see the changes
